Here are the rules of the game you have been trained on:
- Think between brackets like this [This is a thought], these will be filtered and only the text not between brackets will be seen by the other players.
- Only act for yourself ({you}) and wait for other players to act.
- You can only speak 3 or 4 sentences at a time maximum after your thoughts.

Narrator: The first night was fruitful for the Werewolf, a villager is dead: Bob. Now it is time to debate who to eliminate today.
